channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Harris' branding of Trump as fascist falling flat with voters
item.description: Democrats are warning Kamala Harris has overplayed the Nazi card as she slips behind former President Donald Trump in the final days of the campaign.

item.title: Starbucks threatens to fire staff who don’t come back to office
item.description: CEO Brian Niccol’s own work arrangement allows him to live in California and travel 1,000 miles to Seattle on the company’s corporate jet.

item.title: How the Biden-Harris Administration Created an Unlawful AI Regulatory Agency

item.title: 'She is endangering the life of Donald J. Trump': Vance fires back at VP Harris' 'Nazi' comparison
item.description: Republican VP candidate JD Vance hit back at Kamala Harris, other Democrats who likened Trump's Madison Square Garden rally to a 'Nazi' event.

item.title: Trump says Harris ‘running a campaign of demonization and hate’ in closing message to Georgia voters

item.description: The coin depicts President Franklin D. Roosevelt and is one of just two known to exist without its distinctive “S” mint mark.

item.title: Nevada Supreme Court Orders Counting Mail Ballots Without Postmark After Election Day
item.description: The Nevada Supreme Court ruled on Monday that mail-in ballots lacking a postmark may be counted in the days after the election.
